name: nJoy

Developer Terms of Use
des: The nJoy Thermostat offers outstanding temperature control for the greatest comfort in your home. The comprehensive set of functions and features supported by the most intuitive user interface leaves you in the full control - any time and through the App (iOS or Android) from anywhere. The integrated support for Alexa enables you to take charge of you comfort in the most straight forward and efficient way - just speak out you request and Alexa will assist you! All you have to do is to select "Enable skill" for linking your account and afterwards have Alexa connect to your OJ Microline. Alexa will then respond to requests like "Alexa, what is the temperature in my kitchen?" or "Alexa, increase the temperature in my bathroom by 3 degrees".
